txHandlingModal.ibcTransferSubtitle: This may take up to 1 minute

txHandlingModal.failedSwap: Your {amount} could not be swapped to {denom} on {chain}.

txHandlingModal.failedWithdrawLiquidity: Could not withdraw liquidity from the {denom} on the Cosmos Hub.

swap.title: Swap
swap.tooltipSwapLimit: You cannot swap more than 10% of the pool's available liquidity. Try swapping a smaller amount.
swap.tooltipNoPool: Currently there is no pool for this pair, please select other pair
swap.tooltipChainDown: Cosmos Hub appears to be down, swap is temporarily unavailable
swap.disabledMessage: Swapping is about to get even more powerful. Watch this space!
swap.transactionAcrossChains: 1 transaction across {chains} chains | {txs} transactions across {chains} chains

transferToHub.swap: Assets are swapped on the Cosmos Hub
transferToHub.swapDescription: Your {denom} must first be transferred to the Cosmos Hub before they can be swapped.
transferToHub.stakeDescription: In order to stake your {denom}, your {denom} must first be transferred to the {chain} chain.
transferToHub.addLiquidity: Pools are on the Cosmos Hub
transferToHub.addLiquidityDescription: In order to add liquidity to a pool, your {denom} must be transferred to the Cosmos Hub.
transferToHub.addLiquidityDescriptionMultiple: In order to add liquidity to a pool, your {denomA} and {denomB} must be transferred to the Cosmos Hub.
transferToHub.transferDescription: Emeris gives you the ability to transfer your assets to different chains. This is made possible through a brand new protocol for inter-blockchain communication.
transferToHub.transferDescriptionMultiple: You are about to send {denom} from {fromChain} to {toChain}. Because your {denom} are not on their native chain ({nativeChain}), they will need to be transferred back to {nativeChain} before they can be sent to {toChain}. This means you will need to sign two transactions.
transferToHub.transferDescriptionMultipleMemo: You are about to send {denom} from {fromChain} to {toChain}. Because your {denom} are not on their native chain ({nativeChain}), they will need to be transferred back to {nativeChain} before they can be sent to {toChain} and you specified a memo. This means you will need to sign three transactions.

transfer.txToSignHint: The asset you are trying to send is not on its native chain. As a result, two transactions are required to perform this transfer
transfer.txToSignMemoHint: The asset you are trying to send is not on its native chain and you specified a memo. As a result, three transactions are required to perform this transfer
transfer.txToSignMemoNoRedeemHint: You are sending an asset to another chain and specified a memo. As a result, two transactions are required to perform this transfer

maintenance.title: Emeris will be back soon
maintenance.subTitle: Emeris is currently undergoing maintenance. We will be back as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.

addLiquidity.firstProvider: You are the first liquidity provider

addLiquidity.firstProviderWarning: As the first liquidity provider to the {tickerA} · {tickerB} pool, you will be creating the pool and setting the price. Proceed with caution.
addLiquidity.hubWarning: Your assets will be transferred to Cosmos Hub
addLiquidity.createWarning: Creating a pool is risky business
addLiquidity.arbitrageWarning: As the first liquidity provider, you are setting the pool price. This means that if you don’t know what you are doing, you may risk significant loss as a result of arbitrage.
addLiquidity.receiveLpAsset: The shares you will receive based on your contribution to the underlying pool

redeem.title: Redeeming assets

withdrawLiquidity.hubWarning: Your assets will be transferred to Cosmos Hub

modal1.title: Connect your wallet
modal1.text: Connect your Keplr wallet via the Keplr browser extension to use Emeris.
modal1.connectingHelp: Stuck connecting? Make sure you have created an account in {extension} first.

modal2.title: Keplr is required
modal2.text: Install the Keplr browser extension and connect your Keplr wallet to use Emeris.

modal3.title: Not compatible
modal3.text: Emeris is only supported on Chrome, Brave, and Edge. We are working hard on supporting for more browsers.

modal3welcome.title: Your browser is not currently supported

modal4.title: Emeris is in beta
modal4.subtitle: Use at your own risk.
modal4.text1: The current features available on the site are offered in "beta" form ("Beta Services").  By using the Beta Services, You understand and acknowledge that the Beta Services are being provided as a "Beta" version and made available on an "As Is" or "As Available" basis. The Beta Services may contain bugs, errors, and other problems. YOU ASSUME ALL RISKS AND ALL COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH YOUR USE OF THE BETA SERVICES.  By using this website, you also agree to these Terms of Service.

modal5.title: Unsupported device
modal5.text: Emeris will support mobile devices in the future. In the meantime please use the app on a desktop device.
